text: Francis Cottam (6 June 1900 – 19 May 1987) was an English cricketer. He was a right-handed batsman and a left-arm slow bowler. He was born and died in Redhill, Surrey. Cottam made just one first-class appearance, for Essex, during the 1922 season, against Dublin University. He did not bat during the match, but bowled for ten overs without taking a wicket. ==References== ==External links== *Francis Cottam at Cricket Archive Category:1900 births Category:1987 deaths Category:English cricketers Category:Essex cricketers Category:People from Redhill, Surrey
title: Francis Cottam
